form.label: Zeek SMTP (V2.0)
form.description: V2 Additions: Dashboard Now Rides The Zeek_Suite Datamodel

search.query:
| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.SMTP by SMTP.subject,SMTP.id_orig_h, SMTP.src_user, SMTP.id_resp_h, SMTP.recipient | rename SMTP.subject AS subject, SMTP.id_orig_h AS id.orig_h, SMTP.src_user AS src_user, SMTP.id_resp_h AS id.resp_h, SMTP.recipient AS recipient
| sort -count | rename subject AS "Subject",id.resp_h AS "Destination", src_user AS "Sender", recipient AS "Recipient", id.orig_h AS "Source"

| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.SMTP by SMTP.last_reply, SMTP.id_orig_h, SMTP.src_user, SMTP.id_resp_h, SMTP.recipient | rename SMTP.last_reply AS last_reply, SMTP.id_orig_h AS id.orig_h, SMTP.src_user AS src_user, SMTP.id_resp_h AS id.resp_h, SMTP.recipient AS recipient
| where !like (last_reply, "%Queued mail for delivery") AND !like (last_reply, "%2.0.0 Service closing transmission channel") AND !like(last_reply, "220 2.0.0 SMTP server ready") | sort -count
| rename last_reply AS "Last Reply",id.resp_h AS "Destination", src_user AS "Sender", recipient AS "Recipient", id.orig_h AS "Source"
